verses.text: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* captives \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*,\f + \fr 126:1 \ft Or brought back the captives to Zion; or restored the fortunes of Zion \f* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dreamers.\f + \fr 126:1 \ft Or like those restored to health\f*

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w were|strong="H1471"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, “\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* filled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* joy.

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w captives|strong="H7622"\w*,\f + \fr 126:4 \ft Or Restore our fortunes\f* \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w like|strong="H7725"\w* streams \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w*.

Those who \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H2232"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* will \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w with|strong="H7114"\w* \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w* \w of|strong="H7440"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w who|strong="H1980"\w* \w goes|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trail \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w return|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*, \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* sheaves \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w grain|strong="H2233"\w*.
